constantValues: A requested facility represents a facility that is requested by a corporate customer applying for line of credit.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: amount

constantValues: The amount of the facility that customer is applying for under the requested line of credit such as the bank guarantee amount or term loan amount.

members.description: The amount of the facility that customer is applying for under the requested line of credit such as the bank guarantee amount or term loan amount.

members.name: amountBase

constantValues: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.name: fundingEvent

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Indication of when the client needs the funding of this facility to be done; immediately upon implementation of the line of credit, or at a later time.

members.description: Indication of when the client needs the funding of this facility to be done; immediately upon implementation of the line of credit, or at a later time.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'fundingEvent_display' is added to the 'RequestedFacility' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'fundingEvent'
addSupportingAttribute.name: fundingEvent_display

members.name: interestRate

constantValues: The rate of interest applicable to the selected facility. The applicable rate must be fetched from the product catalog based on the requested amount.

members.description: The rate of interest applicable to the selected facility. The applicable rate must be fetched from the product catalog based on the requested amount.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: processingCharges

constantValues: The processing charges applicable to the selected facility. The applicable rate must be fetched from the product catalog based on the requested amount.

members.description: The processing charges applicable to the selected facility. The applicable rate must be fetched from the product catalog based on the requested amount.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: productId

constantValues: The facility that the corporate customer is requesting as part of the credit line application.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The facility that the corporate customer is requesting as part of the credit line application.

members.name: purpose

constantValues: The purpose of the facility requested under the credit line.

members.description: The purpose of the facility requested under the credit line.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: deprecatedStageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'RequestedFacility' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Requested Facility

members.description: Reason for the status of the Requested Facility

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'RequestedFacility' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the entity.

members.name: deprecatedTraversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

definitions.description: A requested facility represents a facility that is requested by a corporate customer applying for line of credit.
